prompts: Create a gooey Pokemon that can camouflage itself in the environment.
I want a Pokemon with a unique ability to absorb toxins from its surroundings.
Generate a purple, sludgy creature that thrives in polluted areas.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a puddle of goo but has powerful poison abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon known for its sludgy movements and toxic attacks.
Design a creature that can manipulate its shape while remaining slimy and purple.
Show me a Pokemon that is both a menace in battles and a hazard in the wild.
